full_text: Bee une Eat: 2019/KER/1225 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW WEDNESDAY ,THE O9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 8655 of 2018 AGAINST THE JUDGMENT IN SC 349/2013 of ASST. SESSIONS COURT, MANJERI DATED 09-08-2016 CRIME NO. 161/2013 OF Vengara Police Station , Malappuram PETITIONER: ABDUL SALEEM, AGED 31 YEARS S/O ABDURAHIMAN , KARALAKATH HOUSE , AREEKULAM , VENGARA , MALAPPURAM DISTRICT BY ADV. SRI.P.M.RAFIO RESPONDENTS : 1 MOIDEEN, S/O MOOSA,KANKARAKADAN HOUSE ,MATTATHUR AMSOM , MOOLAPARAMB , OTHUKKUNGAL , KOTTAKKAL , MALAPPURAM DISTRICT 2 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR,HIGH COURT OF KERALA , ERNAKULAM BY ADV. SRI.V.C.SARATH SRI.ALEX M THOMBRA SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: meee Bere 2019/KER/1225 Cr1.MC.No. 8655 of 2018 2 ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioner was the first accused in S.C.No.597 of 2016 on the file of the Asst. Sessions Judge, Manjeri. He and the co-accused allegedly committed the offences under Sections 364 and 392 IPC. As the petitioner was absconding, only the others were tried. They were acquitted by Annexure-B judgment. Later the petitioner surrendered and his case is now pending as S.C.No.5 of 2019. The proceedings are sought to be quashed in the light of the acquittal of the co-accused. Moreover, the matter has been settled. The first respondent is the victim. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. IT am satisfied that the trial of the petitioner will not serve any purpose since the co- accused has been acquitted and the matter has been ay Pumped [OR 2019/KER/1225 Cr1.MC.No. 8655 of 2018 3 settled. In the result, this Crl.M.C is allowed. The proceedings in S.C.No.5 of 2019 on the file of the Asst. Sessions Judge, Manjeri are quashed. If any material objects have been produced in this case, the trial court may pass appropriate orders for their disposal. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE pm ay union ese 2019/KER/1225 Cr1.MC.No. 8655 of 2018 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO 1161/2013 OF VENGARA POLICE STATION ,MALAPPURAM DISTRICT ANNEXURE B THE TRUE COPY OF THE JUDGMENT IN SC NO 439/2013 OF THE COURT OF ASSISTANT SESSIONS JUDGE ,MANJERI ,DATED 9.8.2016 ANNEXURE C THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY 1ST RESPONDENT INFORMING THE FACTUM OF SETTLEMENT RESPONDENTS ' EXHIBITS: NIL // TRUE COPY // PA TO JUDGE
